verses.name: Numbers 23:14
verses.text: And he brought him into the field of Zophim, to the top of Pisgah, and built seven altars, and offered a bullock and a ram on every altar.

verses.name: Numbers 23:15
verses.text: And he said unto Balak, Stand here by thy burnt offering, while I meet the Lord yonder.

verses.name: Numbers 23:16
verses.text: And the Lord met Balaam, and put a word in his mouth, and said, Go again unto Balak, and say thus.

verses.name: Numbers 23:17
verses.text: And when he came to him, behold, he stood by his burnt offering, and the princes of Moab with him. And Balak said unto him, What hath the Lord spoken?
